channel_info.description:

transcription: {"text": "Just from this podcast, we're talking about copywriting and closing. Those are two jobs that you can have living in Vietnam or living in Mexico City or living wherever. You don't need a college degree for it. You don't need a bunch of money to learn how to do it, and you can do it from home. Yeah, yeah, no, and it's great. I would say, speaking of college, I would say college is just a complete scam at this point. Like, it's probably one of the biggest scams out there, unless you're gonna be a doctor, like, you know. You have a trade. Yeah, like a trade, accountant, whatever it may be. Otherwise, if you're just going, you know, studying liberal arts or communication, there's no point. There's no point in going and studying business. Just go learn, you know, spend five, six months learning a skill, building the business that way. You're gonna learn so much more. Go travel to a place like Vietnam where there's tons of entrepreneurs. Yes. Connect with them, and you're gonna have so much more success by the time you're, you know, you're 21, 22 than you would if you had a college degree. And, like, I've been hiring for years. I don't even look at people's resume. Like, I have a conversation with people, and that's how I do my hiring, because I can tell a lot just from having one conversation.
